userinput.command: ./configure -prefix /opt/qt-&qt-version; -qt-gif -system-libpng \ -system-libmng -system-zlib -system-libjpeg -no-g++-exceptions \ -thread && make && make install && ln -sfn /opt/qt-&qt-version; /opt/qt && ln -s /opt/qt/lib/libqt-mt.so /opt/qt/lib/libqt.so && cp -r doc/man /opt/qt/doc && cp -r examples /opt/qt/doc
